title: Inquire About a Department's Budget
description: A citizen wants to know the annual budget for the city's Parks and Recreation department.

tasks.description: Receive the citizen's request for information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the citizen is asking for public budget information.

tasks.description: Search the public-facing financial portal for the city's approved annual budget.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the current fiscal year's budget document.

tasks.description: Locate the specific line-item or section for the Parks and Recreation department and provide the total budget amount to the citizen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds and communicates the correct budget figure.
